mapper.insert: INSERT INTO performance(perform_idx,theater_idx, perform_title, poster, showtime, grade, detail, start_date, end_date) VALUES(perform_idx_seq.nextval,#{theater_idx}, #{perform_title}, #{poster}, #{showtime}, #{grade}, #{detail}, #{start_date}, #{end_date})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM performance p, theater t WHERE p.theater_idx=t.theater_idx AND p.end_date > sysdate+1 ORDER BY p.start_date
SELECT * FROM performance p, theater t WHERE p.theater_idx=t.theater_idx AND end_date > sysdate-1 ORDER BY start_date
SELECT * FROM performance p, theater t WHERE p.theater_idx=t.theater_idx AND perform_idx=#{perform_idx}
